name: Color Rebounds
description:
This game is for two players.

Both of players have own board to play with. You can control boards only on x-axis. You most protect your side from the ball. When the ball is collision with your board the color of the ball changes to your color. When you have the ball on your color then your side grows. 

To win the game one of player most paint the whole game bord to their own color.
